Key Match Events: Anthony Davis recorded a triple-double with 19 points, 10 rebounds, and 16 assists
LeBron James scored 19 points, grabbed 10 rebounds, and dished out 16 assists for a triple-double
Anthony Davis hit a buzzer-beating step-back three to end the first half
Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Davis held the league lead for scoring at 32.4 points per game
LeBron James and Anthony Davis are fighting to keep the Lakers in the playoff picture
Toronto Raptors were 2-8 and had dropped three straight games
The Raptors had lost three of the previous four games on the road
Post-Match Reflections: Toronto Raptors showed effort and energy, but were unable to keep up with the Lakers' talent
Jakob Poeltl was forced to leave the game due to an injury sustained in the fourth quarter
RJ Barrett led the Raptors with 18 points, with all five starters scoring at least 12 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis led the Lakers with 19 points, 10 rebounds, and 16 assists
Austin Reaves led the scoring with 27 points for the Lakers
The Lakers pulled away with a 19-8 run after Anthony Davis left the game due to injury
